doc.title: The Phantom of the Opera
doc.plot: An animated version of Gaston Leroux's everlasting tale of "The Phantom of the Opera". Christine is been acting strange the last days - she first of all get the lead part on a new opera and she's arrogant with people, a masked Phantom lurking in the shadows is haunting her keeping her away from other men, striking revenge on the world above, he also have a good side, a side that was tortured since childhood.
